model.disc

Interface RemoteDisc

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Disc

    public interface RemoteDisc
extends java.rmi.Remote
    interface that give RMI methods from disc service
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Zhukouski Pavel

      • selectSpecificSongs

        java.util.List<Songs> selectSpecificSongs(double duration,
                                          java.lang.String musician)
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        select songs by both parameters(musician and below certain work duration)
        Parameters:
        duration - maximum work duration
        musician - name of the musician songs works in
        Returns:
        list of songs with required musician with duration below parameter
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        select songs with certain duration
        Parameters:
        minDur - minimal years of work
        maxDur - maximum years of work
        Returns:
        list of songs with defined duration
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
